Welcome back, Ashley!

Hi there! I’m a graphic designer based in Vancouver, British Columbia. I love typography, branding, packaging, minimalism.. oh right, and hockey. Canadian, evvh? When I’m not designing I’m usually watching hockey, eating piles of food, or taking photos. Probably all of them at once.
